definition: Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
Yuyao county level city in Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1], Zhejiang
Yao Bin (1957-), PRC champion ice skater during early 1980s and more recently national skating coach
Yuyao county level city in Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1], Zhejiang
Dayao county in Chuxiong Yi autonomous prefecture 楚雄彞族自治州|楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3 xiong2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Yao Wenyuan (1931-2005), one of the Gang of Four
Dayao county in Chuxiong Yi autonomous prefecture 楚雄彞族自治州|楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3 xiong2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Yao'an county in Chuxiong Yi autonomous prefecture 楚雄彞族自治州|楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3 xiong2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Yao'an county in Chuxiong Yi autonomous prefecture 楚雄彞族自治州|楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3 xiong2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Yao Xueyin (1910-1999), PRC novelist, author of historical novel Li Zicheng 李自成
Yao Silian (557-637), Tang writer and compiler of 梁書|梁书[Liang2 shu1] and 陳書|陈书[Chen2 shu1]

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10时，姚海涛秘书长亲切会见了陆洁女士。

sentences.english: Off the court Yao and his family have their own life.
sentences.chinese: 在球场外，姚和他的家庭有他们自己的生活。

sentences.english: Wang went to the waste house to send gold bars, along the way was Yao Bangyan candid camera.
sentences.chinese: 王蝶衣去废屋送金条，一路上被姚邦彦偷拍。

sentences.english: Yao is just a smokescreen. Morey is definitely building around Chuck Hayes.
sentences.chinese: 姚就是个烟雾，莫雷绝对是在围绕着海耶斯建队。

sentences.english: Meantime, the scientific opportunity Yeomans talks about is a very real thing.
sentences.chinese: 同时，姚曼斯谈到的科学的时机是真正的机会。

sentences.english: Prior to Yao, players over 7'4" were usually one-dimensional freaks.
sentences.chinese: 在姚之前，超过7尺4寸的球员往往都是“一招鲜”。

sentences.english: The position, motivation and destination of abductors remain unknown.
sentences.chinese: 姚立法与绑架者目前所在地和目的地不明。

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor Yao Yongchun also attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 副市长姚永春参加会见。

sentences.english: As JVG said, it there is a guy who should not be injured, it is Yao.
sentences.chinese: 就像范甘迪说的，如果有一个人不该受伤，那就是姚。

sentences.english: Ms. Yao graduated from Henan University and majored in economic management.
sentences.chinese: 姚女士毕业于河南大学经济管理专业。

sentences.english: Consul Li Feng and Vice Consul Yao Yinghua were present at the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 李峰领事和姚英华副领事陪同出席了以上活动。

sentences.english: Yao Weiguo of the "hope that the Morning", the entire screen is Pianleng gray tone.
sentences.chinese: 姚卫国的《希望的早晨》，整个画面是偏冷灰调子。

sentences.english: The county also plans to raise money for the medical needs of her husband and daughter.
sentences.chinese: 巫溪县也计划为姚的老公和女儿筹集医疗资金。

sentences.english: If Hayers or Scola have played with Yao, Yao wouldn't be fouled out!
sentences.chinese: 如果椰子和钻石根姚在一起，姚不会被罚出场。

sentences.english: Director Yao of the liquor monopoly management office of Shenzhen Bureau of Trade and Industry introduces.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市贸工局酒类专卖办理办公室姚主任先容。

sentences.english: It makes me not care about anything else wrt Rockets other than Yao's pain.
sentences.chinese: 除了姚的伤痛，我不会关心任何火箭的其他事了。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
